data.title: Stefan Arndt
data.meta_description: Stefan Arndt, born in Munich in 1961, founded X Filme Creative Pool, Levy as an independent creative alliance in 1994 together with directors Tom Tykwer, Wolfgang Becker and Dani Levy. This was followed in 2000 by the founding of X-Verleih AG. He has received numerous national and international awards for his activities as a producer, […]
